          <title>
            <string language="en">Heating system in a classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizsystem in einem Klassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Système de chauffage dans une salle de classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistema de heating em uma sala de aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistema di riscaldamento in un'aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύστημα θέρμανσης σε μια τάξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema de calefacción en una sala de clase</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the hot water pipes, top grille, fan and bottom grille of a heating system in a classroom.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bottom grille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">class room</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot water pipes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">top grille</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Heißwasserrohre, 
oberen den Grill-, Ventilator- und Unterseitengrill eines Heizsystems 
in einem Klassenzimmer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les pipes d'eau chaude, le 
gril supérieur de gril, de ventilateur et de bas d'un système de 
chauffage dans une salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra as tubulações de água 
quente, a grade superior da grade, do ventilador e do fundo de um 
sistema de heating em uma sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra i tubi dell'acqua calda, la 
griglia superiore della griglia, del ventilatore e della parte 
inferiore di un sistema di riscaldamento in un'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει το θερμό υδροσωλήνα, 
κορυφαία κάγκελα καγκέλων, ανεμιστήρων και κατώτατων σημείων 
ενός συστήματος θέρμανσης σε μια τάξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra los tubos de la agua 
caliente, la parrilla superior de la parrilla, del ventilador y del 
fondo de un sistema de calefacción en una sala de clase.</string>
          </description>
